dialogue.text: Oh no... what do I do?
I'm supposed to be cooking a cake for the Cake Off but my prized tin has broken!
Oh, you don't know about the Great Gielinor Cake Off? It's Party Pete's newest idea!
He's invited representatives from across the world to have their baking skills judged.
Oh! I'm Patty Seer, a wandering cook! I'm traveling the world learning everything I can about food.
Yes, I use it for every cake I bake. It brings me luck.
I'm not sure how, but it's broken in two... Do you think you might be able to help me?
Oh... thank you for the offer but I'm not interested in that.
Wonderful! Was Warmhandz happy with the win?
Do you think they would be interested in travelling and learning with me?
